list.description:
Boykisser package for my fellas

All of the files for each side of the optic along with json files for editing. to be clear not all of them are 1 big sight
there diffrend sights all 4 of them

leave a like or il kiss ya

#furry #boykisser #wtdraw #cute #boy

Всем привет!

Решил выложить прицел сюда по мотивам: https://forum.warthunder.ru/t/izmenenie-standartnoj-priczelnoj-setki/90336

Прицел сделан на основе: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1052013/en/
Создан исключительно для ТРБ (Танковые реалистичные бои). Изначально цель была удалить вертикальные риски с горизонтальной линии прицеливания. В итоге получилось это сделать через отрисовку с нуля линий прицеливания и указателя прицеливания.


Установка стандартная:
- Распаковать архив в папку WarThunder/UserSight/all_tanks (либо в папку с конкретным танком)

quick and simple Raora Panthera sight I made for a friend, but I decided to post it since it's my first sight. I probably should've scaled it down instead of scaling it up.

#sight #anime #hololive #wtdraw

I think i cant remember author but she come from Nikke

#anime #wtdraw #nikke_godess_of_victory #nikke #nikkegoddessofvictory #elegg

坦克瞄具(Tank Sight) : FW3_TANK_A2
通用瞄具-A系列 (Universal - A) : 仿使命召唤狙击镜
From Call of Duty

适配倍率（Zoom of sight） : #m48a2ga2 #erprobungstrager_3_achs_turm
6.0x - 8.0x
4.0x - 12.0x

使用方法 : 已整合进压缩包内
Instructions : Inside the compressed file

相同倍率可通用的瞄具，请不要把它放进all_tanks里面。
用的时候，请注意对照检查炮手瞄准镜缩放倍率。
Same magnification universal . Please do not put it in all_tanks
When using, please pay attention to checking the magnification of the gunner's sight

这是个观赏类瞄具。
This is an ornamental sight.

Very small and thin sight

The drawing in the corner of the sight has slightly lost detail due to the limitation on the number of lines during aiming in battle — the sight preview in the settings mistakenly displayed all the lines.

The base of the sight was generated using a sight generator: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1068145/en/
